attributes.action: Update student loans taken from 1998 – 2006 to the same 25 year maximum payment term as current loans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Loans taken between 1998 and 2006 are valid until repaid or the recipient reaches 65.  Loans taken after 2006 are valid until repaid or a maximum lifespan of 25 years.

We urge the PM to backdate this 25 year decision as we have received exactly the same education as those from 2006 onwards.  I personally have projected my payments to last 38 years which is grossly unfair on students who made the effort to attend university between 1998 and 2006.
